headline: Goldman Offers Interns Jobs in Private Equity — Within the Firm
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is launching a program aimed at dissuading interns who get full-time offers from later jumping ship for potentially more lucrative jobs at private equity firms and other competitors. headline: Billionaire Developer Stephen Ross Closes On A Deal To Buy 45% Of Tennis' Miami Open
summary: Many people go to Florida to retire — not so with billionaire real estate developer and Miami Dolphins owner Stephen Ross. The 85-year-old is in advanced talks to buy a roughly 45% stake in the prestigious Miami Open tennis tournament. According to ...

headline: Trump Set To Sign Executive Order To Unlock 401(k) Access For Private Equity Giants Like Blackstone, Apollo: Report
summary: President Donald Trump is reportedly set to sign an executive order that would make it easier for U.S. retirement plans to invest in private-market assets. What Happened: The executive order, expected to be signed in the next few days, would direct the Labor Department and the Securities and Exchange Commission to issue guidance for employers and plan administrators on incorporating investments such as private assets into 401(k) plans, reported the Wall Street Journal.
